00019 std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &s, const Fortran_Array1D<T> &A)
00020 {
00021     int N=A.dim1();
00022 
00023     s << N << "\n";
00024     for (int j=1; j<=N; j++)
00025     {
00026        s << A(j) << "\n";
00027     }
00028     s << "\n";
00029 
00030     return s;
00031 }
